about_the_game:
A fast-paced 2D runner inspired by classic arcade games, offering short yet punishing levels with a focus on replayability and high-score chasing.

Easy to pick up and play, but hard to master

Master the game's chain-based point rewards by collecting every berry, stomping every enemy, and dodging obstacles at the last possible moment. Only those who push their skills to the limit can achieve the highest scores!

  • This demo gives you a taste of the first world of the game, which includes 20 levels.

  • A badass goose: Jump, slide, and hit at just the right moment—sometimes all at once.

  • Master chain-based point multipliers – Keep up streaks in every level to maximize your score.

  • Berry delicious points: Score by munching on tasty berries.

  • High-risk, high-reward gameplay: Earn extra points by flirting with danger—get close to death without dying.

  • Unleash your fury: Play aggressively and take down enemies before they strike to rack up even more points.

  • Charming visuals: Enjoy cute and colorful hand-drawn characters and environments.

  • A heartfelt story: Experience a tale of parental love and delivering justice to those who wronged you—but mostly parental love.

  • Steam achievements: Challenge yourself with 14 achievements exclusive to the demo.

  • Steam Deck Compatible: We’ve tested it to make sure this demo runs smoothly on Steam Deck for a fun, portable experience.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or later or equivalent
  • Processor: Quad-Core CPU (Intel Core i5-2400, AMD FX-8350)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 630 or better or AMD/NVIDIA equivalent
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 screen aspect ratio is recommended
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or later (or equivalent)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or Intel Core i7-8700 (or better)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 560 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 screen aspect ratio is recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11 (Big Sur)
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core i7 (Quad-Core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 GPU or Intel HD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 screen aspect ratio is recommended
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 12 (Monterey) or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 Pro or Intel Core i7 (6-core) or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 Pro GPU or AMD Radeon Pro 560X (or better)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 screen aspect ratio is recommended

short_description: Not your everyday goose chase—this time, the goose is on the hunt! Sprint through vibrant levels, dodge obstacles, collect berries, stomp enemies, and take bold risks! Keep running, push your limits, and reclaim what’s yours! Play through 20 action-packed levels featured in this demo!
